Privacy.welcome.defaultMessage: Welcome to ggbot. Please read this Privacy Policy carefully as you agree to be bound by it while using the ggbot platform.

Privacy.personalDataNotShared.defaultMessage: Your Personal Data is not shared with third parties other than AWS and Stripe as mentioned below.

Privacy.binanceCustomerData.defaultMessage: Binance exchange is used as a market provider. You will be asked to give information about your account, according to your Country's regulations. The ggbot platform is not involved at all in this process, and does not have access to the data you are required to share with Binance.

Privacy.binanceTradingData.defaultMessage: Binance holds all your trading data, including orders, staking and any other crypto activity you perform on that exchange. The ggbot platform does not retrieve your trading data from Binance but it keeps track of the operations you perform using the ggbot strategies in order to provide you information about your orders, profits, etc. and stores these data with a retention period of {numYears} years.

Privacy.stripe.defaultMessage: Stripe is used as payments provider: during checkout your email will be prefilled and you will be asked to enter your country and credit card information such as cardholder name. The ggbot platform does not store your country nor your credit card information.

Privacy.personalDataOnlyEmail.defaultMessage: No Personal Data is collected other than your account email. This website does not use cookies and does not track you at all.

Privacy.personalDataEmailUsage.defaultMessage: Your account email is used for authentication and communications. Communications are limited to what is strictly necessary, for example to inform you when there is an issue on your strategies that may impact your profits.

Privacy.personalDataSecureStorage.defaultMessage: We store all Personal Data on secure servers administered by AWS (Amazon Web Services) which is a popular cloud provider. This is very common, many of the websites you visit run on AWS.

Privacy.personalDataEmailService.defaultMessage: No third party service is used for email communications, we are using AWS Simple Email Service.

RegenerateOneTimePassword.message.defaultMessage: Need to generate one time password again.

RenameStrategy.chooseName.defaultMessage: Choose a new name for your strategy.

Schedulings.noActiveSubscription.defaultMessage: Cannot manage schedulings without a subscription.

ShareStrategy.error.defaultMessage: Could not share strategy. Please copy URL manually.

Strategies.noStrategy.defaultMessage: You have no strategy yet. Create a new strategy or copy one from a shared link.

StrategiesErrorExceededQuota.message.defaultMessage: Cannot create more strategies. Check your account quotas.

SubscriptionPurchase.couldRenew.defaultMessage: Your subscription will expire soon, please consider renew it.

SubscriptionPurchase.purchaseCurrency.defaultMessage: Prices are expressed in Euro currency (â‚¬).

SubscriptionPurchase.hint.defaultMessage: Go for {numMonths} months subscription and get 1 month for free.

SubscriptionPurchased.message.defaultMessage: You are now able to use ggbot strategies.

SubscriptionPurchased.support.defaultMessage: For any issue, please contact Telegram support group.

Terms.welcome.defaultMessage: Welcome to ggbot. Please read this Terms of Service carefully as you agree to be bound by it while using the ggbot website.

Terms.accessWithEmail.defaultMessage: You access ggbot website with your account email. Keep your email safe, it is your responsibility.

Terms.binanceApi.defaultMessage: The ggbot platform interacts with Binance Exchange and needs your approval to access your Binance account using a Binance API key.

Terms.binanceNoWithdrawals.defaultMessage: It is crucial to understand that ggbot will use a Binance API key only if its withdrawal permission is disabled. This means that ggbot as well as any other human or software that will access the Binance API key you provided, will not be able to withdraw from your Binance account.

Terms.binanceUSisNotSupported.defaultMessage: Currently ggbot is not available in the United States. We are sorry but Binance US is not supported. While this would be easily achievable technically and ggbot could already provide this feature out of the box, it could be hard for us for legal reasons. We are a small and growing team and we would love to enter the US market! Right now it is out of our scope.

Terms.fullfillmentPolicies.defaultMessage: Once you have purchased a payment plan, ggbot will be able to trade using your Binance account and make profits with trading strategies. There is no recurrent subscription, so cancellation does not apply. You can opt out at any time but refund is not handled automatically: please contact support group on Telegram in case you want a refund.

Terms.strategies.defaultMessage: The ggbot platform let you run trading strategies on Binance Exchange. You can copy strategies from other users, and schedule them with custom parameters accorgin to your needs (for instance the amount). You can also modify a strategy as well as create a new one or share them.

Terms.profitAndLoss.defaultMessage: A strategy can be profitable, many of them are already generating a considerable amount of profit yearly. Be aware that you may misuse a strategy by setting wrong parameters or creating a failing strategy that can cause losses. There can be other issues like setting a strategy without having enough budget. The ggbot team will be available to share successfull strategies but we are not responsible of any loss you may have for any reason. To avoid losses it is a good practice to run a backtest on your strategy: you can do so using the ggbot website. For any question do not hesitate to contact the ggbot support group on Telegram.

Terms.pricingVat.defaultMessage: All prices shown on the website include the applicable VAT rate. Depending on your country of purchase, other local charges and taxes may also apply.

Terms.privacy.defaultMessage: Please review our Privacy Policy as it governs the privacy practices undertaken by ggbot.

TimeoutError.message.defaultMessage: Request not sent. Please check connectivity and try again.
